RemotePlayback.summary: The RemotePlayback interface of the allows the page to detect availability of remote playback devices, then connect to and control playing on these devices.

RemotePlaybackDisconnect.summary: The disconnect event of the interface fires when the user agent disconnects from the remote device.

RemotePlaybackWatchAvailability.summary: The watchAvailability() method of the interface watches the list of available remote playback devices and returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with the callbackId of a remote playback device.
RemotePlaybackWatchAvailability.returns: A that resolves with an integer. This is the callbackId for the identified remote playback device.

RemotePlaybackPrompt.summary: The prompt() method of the interface prompts the user to select an available remote playback device and give permission for the current media to be played using that device.

remarks.para: If the user gives permission, the will be set to connecting and the user agent will connect to the device to initiate playback.
If the user chooses to instead disconnect from the device, the will be set to disconnected and user agent will disconnect from this device.

RemotePlaybackPrompt.returns: A that resolves with undefined after the user accepts or rejects the prompt.

RemotePlaybackState.summary: The state read-only property of the interface returns the current state of the RemotePlayback connection.

RemotePlaybackCancelWatchAvailability.summary: The cancelWatchAvailability() method of the interface cancels the request to watch for one or all available devices.

RemotePlaybackConnect.summary: The connect event of the interface fires when the user agent connects to the remote device.

RemotePlaybackConnecting.summary: The connecting event of the interface fires when the user agent initiates remote playback.
